Title: Relates to pre-arranged for-hire vehicle transportation services
Summary: Relates to pre-arranged for-hire vehicle transportation services and the maximization of energy efficiency, universal design and accessibility by persons with disabilities.
LawCode: Add ยง1220-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to pre-arranged for-hire vehicle transportation services and the maximization of energy efficiency, universal design and accessibility by persons with disabilities
